name: Functional/Trophic Groups
functionStatement: Species interactions sustain biodiversity, restrain invasives, and build resilience to disturbance.
descriptionMarkdown: Balanced feeding guilds (herbivores, detritivores, predators) if historically expected, unless skewed.

levels.label: Strongly Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Very few species. Mostly tolerant taxa.
Criteria: Extremely low richness and diversity. Poor index score.

levels.label: Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Few species. One or two groups dominate.
Criteria: Low richness. Dominance by tolerant taxa or single group.

levels.label: Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Several species present. Some groups missing.
Criteria: Moderate richness. Some imbalance in feeding groups.

levels.label: Strongly Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Many species across several feeding groups.
Criteria: High richness. Balanced feeding groups. Good index score.
